p.s: The scene from the play Macbeth, written by William Shakespeare is about Lady Macbeth and how she tries to convince Macbeth to murder Duncan.
It finds place in the home from Macbeth where his lady waits after she reads the letter from him.
He wrote a letter after the prophesyprophecy about he as a king and told it to Lady Macbeth.
When he arrives home he survived a battle and was granted with the title Thane of Cawdor.
Because of that he wants to prepare a banquet in honour of Duncan, the present king.
Now Lady Macbeth tries to convince her husband to go after the prophesyprophecy.
First Macbeth is undecided but after Lady Macbeth talks him into believing that murdering is the only way to become king, he is convinced.
At the end of the scene he underlines that he is ready to go for it.
